EMAIL_2FA_KEY: (secret used to generate codes for user email 2fa)
EMAIL_HOST: (email service provider for backend email automation)
EMAIL_SECURE: (boolean, sets whether email host uses secure connection on specified port)
FIDO_AUTHENTICATOR_REQUIRE_RESIDENT_KEY: (boolean, sets whether fido authenticator requires resident key)
FIDO_AUTHENTICATOR_USER_VERIFICATION: (string, sets user verification level for fido authenticator)
FIDO_CRYPTO_PARAMETERS: (array of integers, sets crypto parameters for fido authenticator)
PEPPER: (global secret used as another layer of security for user password hashing)
